definition: a student should not be guided until he has made an effort to express his thoughts (idiom)
(negative prefix)/not/no
to want to articulate one's thoughts but be unable to
(negative prefix)/not/no
hair/Taiwan pr. [fa3]
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
a student shall not be enlightened until he has tried hard by himself (idiom)
study tirelessly, teach with endless enthusiasm (idiom, from Analects)
pinyin: xue2 er2 bu4 yan4 , hui4 ren2 bu4 juan4

definition: To learn without thinking is confusing, to think without learning is dangerous (Confucius)
pinyin: xue2 er2 bu4 si1 ze2 wang3 , si1 er2 bu4 xue2 ze2 dai4
related.word: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆

definition: study tirelessly (idiom, from Analects)
hear what he says and observe what he does (idiom, from Analects); judge a person not by his words, but by his actions
pinyin: ting1 qi2 yan2 er2 guan1 qi2 xing2

definition: Zai Yu sleeps by day (idiom); refers to story in Analects of Confucius remonstrating bitterly with his student for sleeping during lectures
Confucius says:
good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked
pinyin: jun1 zi5 tan3 dang4 dang4 , xiao3 ren2 chang2 qi1 qi1
related.word: 君子坦荡荡，小人长戚戚

definition: to introspect/to self-reflect/(math.) reflexive
to thrive in calamity and perish in soft living (idiom)/life springs from sorrow and calamity, death comes from ease and pleasure
pinyin: sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4

definition: Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
lit. fight tigers with one's bare hands and wade across raging rivers (idiom)/fig. to display foolhardy courage
Knowledge is not innate to man, how can we overcome doubt?/We are not born with knowledge, how does one achieve maturity? (i.e. without guidance from a teacher - Tang dynasty essayist Han Yu 韓愈|韩愈)
pinyin: ren2 fei1 sheng1 er2 zhi1 zhi1 zhe3 , shu2 neng2 wu2 huo4
related.word: 人非生而知之者，孰能无惑

definition: so dedicated as to forget one's meals (idiom)
see 生於憂患，死於安樂|生于忧患，死于安乐[sheng1 yu2 you1 huan4 , si3 yu2 an1 le4]
What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)/Do as you would be done by./Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
pinyin: ji3 suo3 bu4 yu4 , wu4 shi1 yu2 ren2
